deployment.author: N/A
deployment.message:
{"type":"deployment","sha":"7d12e36e6c1c35fc45238d2c5785dd64a6fce8d6","repoName":"mxchestnut/sharedthread","actor":"mxchestnut","slotName":"production","commitMessage":"feat: implement NextAuth.js + Keycloak OAuth authentication

- Replace custom JWT auth with NextAuth.js + Keycloak OAuth
- Add Keycloak provider with production server at gate.sharedthread.co
- Update Prisma schema for NextAuth compatibility
- Convert sign-in page to use Keycloak OAuth
- Add session management with admin role assignment
- Configure environment variables for production deployment

This migration provides secure, production-ready OAuth authentication
with self-hosted Keycloak server for complete control and security."}
